item.title: Case Competition
item.dc:creator: AsperBAAadmin
item.description:
The newly created Business Analytics Association (BAA) Case Competition is scheduled to take place annually either during the fall or...

The post Case Competition appeared first on AsperBAA.
item.content:encoded:
The newly created Business Analytics Association (BAA) Case Competition is scheduled to take place annually either during the fall or winter term. By offering this competition, BAA aims to cultivate analytical thinking, problem-solving skills, and real-world application of business analytics concepts to solve a business problem. This event will provide a platform for students to showcase their ideas with industry professionals, and gain valuable experience in tackling complex business challenges. Through this initiative, BAA seeks to promote strategical thinking among students and prepare them for successful careers in the field.

Sign Up Link:

The post Case Competition appeared first on AsperBAA.

item.title: BizTek
item.dc:creator: AsperBAAadmin
item.description:
Biztek is the annual event held by the Business Analytics Association (BAA) formerly known as Management Information Systems Association (MISA)....

The post BizTek appeared first on AsperBAA.
item.content:encoded:
Biztek is the annual event held by the Business Analytics Association (BAA) formerly known as Management Information Systems Association (MISA). The goal of this event is to help students explore possible career opportunities in the field of Business Analytics or Tech and establish relationships with potential employers. Biztek invites leaders in the management and IT fields to share their experiences with the students.

With the incorporation of a new name to Business Analytics and its need, Biztek will include a wine & cheese reception, dinner, awards, and speeches from our sponsors where students will have the ability to sit with the company of their choice and chat. Biztek is a great opportunity for businesses wanting to meet and possibly recruit students within the new Business Analytics major, Management Information System major, as well as those students from other majors who are interested in the corporate IT field.

Link:

The post BizTek appeared first on AsperBAA.

item.title: Tech Expo
item.dc:creator: AsperBAAadmin
item.description:
The newly create BAA Tech Expo is an event where companies can demonstrate their AI products, technologies, and solutions to...

The post Tech Expo appeared first on AsperBAA.
item.content:encoded:
The newly create BAA Tech Expo is an event where companies can demonstrate their AI products, technologies, and solutions to students. This allows them to showcase their expertise and engage with attendees who are interested in the latest advancements in AI and tech. During this event, there would be a workshop as well as a networking session where students can ask questions and openly communicate with the sponsors.

Link:

The post Tech Expo appeared first on AsperBAA.

item.title: Meet and greet
item.dc:creator: AsperBAAadmin
item.description:
This is an interactive event designed to welcome students to the Business Analytics Association STAG at the I.H Asper School...

The post Meet and greet appeared first on AsperBAA.
item.content:encoded:
This is an interactive event designed to welcome students to the Business Analytics Association STAG at the I.H Asper School of Business. This first event aims to acquire new members, foster connections among current and potential members, introduce them to our STAG, and showcase upcoming opportunities and initiatives within the association. Through engaging activities like games, and networking sessions, students will gain insights into the field, build valuable relationships, and feel inspired to actively participate in future events.

Sign-up Link:

The post Meet and greet appeared first on AsperBAA.
